author: Mario Castillo
comment: Since latest Android wear update I have to synch both the phone app and the watch app constantly for Google fit and weather to work properly. The watch app takes over the phone app on default goals, weather a d other settings so what's the point of having the phone app then?

author: Stephen McLean
comment: Yeah, didn't realize the free version looked so different than the premium version. Not interested in paying for it, if I cannot test it. The free version looks cheep, and not at all what I want. Sorry, no go.

author: KK Yau
comment: Useless weather,  after synchronized, still show 0C on the wear. Cannot change weather provider, it is required Purchase.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to change a weather provider.

author: Sharon Lam
comment: It's good but I have to keep disconnecting and reconnecting google fit to reset my steps counter. It keeps freezing.

author: Barry Morgan
comment: My favourite watch face of all time but unfortunately cannot use it anymore as after the last android wear update there has been devastating sudden battery drain issues, please optimise this excellent watch face so people can use it and I'll be your best friend ;-)

author: Edd woolnough
comment: Brilliant thanks

author: Adam Silcock
comment: Love this face, only issue is the dot text in the left & right hand info windows are hard to read as it's faint. Next to impossible in day light, needs a solid text option like in the example photos for the face. Other than that it has everything at a glance.

author: Mel Mor
comment: Bought premium. Complications do not work on face. Cannot change shortcuts. Overall bad purchase.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to reinstall the app. UPDATE: any feedback about this issue?

author: robert snoke
comment: Will not install

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to install from watch store located on your wearable or press Remote install from companion app and it will open store on your watch. UPDATE: any feedback?

author: Sreeraj K
comment: Nicely

author: Christopher Marx
comment: Great watchface. I love the detail of the complications. The default color could use some tweaking though to really stand out.  It would have been nicer to get a taste of them before I purchased though.  But I guess you are relying upon the Play Store's refund process instead.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Tnx :)

author: Chirica MIHAI
comment: LE: The predefined colours can be accessed just if you buy premium version. After I tried for 20 minutes to find out what colours they used on demo screen I gave up. Is it so hard to put some predefined colours instead of just those stupid dials?

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, if you need some predefined colors, just tap on center to switch between them, but if you need more colors you can find it on the companion app or watch settings under  colors option. Please, if you still have a problem with this send is an email and we will help you with color setting.

author: Gary & Keri Hazen
comment: Great features, but weather fails to update regularly, and date number is so small and close to the month name, it is very difficult to read.

author: Paul Baird
comment: Was an amazing watch face and then last week Google fit steps stopped working (not updating) account is linked fine and other watches faces from the same Dev work without any issue.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to reconnected FIT or reinstall the companion app. It should work then again.

author: Barrington Powell
comment: I just purchased the  app on my  Moto  2.5 and  it is not on my watch face at all. I followed your directions and went to the app store on my watch  and I could not even find the product  Yes that is the one. 2nd Gen. Thank you. That worked. Prompt service

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, great! Just consider to re-rate again if you satisfied. It means a lot to us :)
